basic_info.description: Hi there! My name is Phillip Chaplin and I am a Full Stack Python and Django Developer with a passion for creating high-quality web applications. I have a deep understanding of web development technologies and frameworks, including Python, Django, React, Node.js, Bootstrap, Elastic Beanstalk, Route53, Amazon RDS, CSS, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Platinum Painting
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. Has the ability to store customer, estimate and user information as well as the ability to calculate the cost of any interior, exterior or gutter job the estimator is tasked with performing. I utilized technology and frameworks including Python, Django, Javscript, Ajax, CSS, Bootstrap, PostgreSQL, AWS Elastic Beanstalk, Amazon RDS and Route53.

projects.title: Ruth.less Photography
projects.description: A group project in which we built a photography website.  I was responsible for appointment scheduling and scrolling as well as toggling between different sections on our gallery page.

projects.title: Final Project Placeholder
projects.description: This is a placeholder for my final project
